backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing user profiles, categories, works, and certificates with access control and CRUD operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping themeâ€‘related feature requests to affected CSS files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of key frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and global styles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining light and dark mode design tokens using OKLCH values.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app handling client-side routing, theming, and React Query provider setup.
frontend/src/components/AuthButton.tsx: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx: Contact form with validation, controlled inputs, simulated submission, and success feedback.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Main layout with navigation, theme toggle, mobile menu, and authentication controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Provides authentication and admin authorization state by checking identity and querying the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useCertificates.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating certificate data through the backend actor with toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook for managing authentication, identity loading, and login state.
frontend/src/hooks/usePhotographyWorks.t: React Query hooks for CRUD operations on photography works using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/usePortfolioCategorie: React Query hooks for managing portfolio categories, including creation, editing, and deletion.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides basic backend query access by exposing actor and fetch state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS layers, theme variables, and base styling for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that initializes React, QueryClient, and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with mission, values, and styled sections.
frontend/src/pages/CertificatesPage.tsx: Renders a certificates management page with CRUD dialogs and authenticated admin controls using certificate hooks.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays a contact form and static contact info cards with icons and office hours.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows a marketing-style landing page with hero content, feature cards, and navigation CTAs.
frontend/src/pages/PortfolioPage.tsx: Provides category and photography work management with CRUD dialogs, filtering, and authenticated admin tools.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended theme colors, fonts, shadows, and custom animations using several plugins.
project_state.json: Stores the project's state, including feature definitions, issues, and a summary of site requirements and theming problems.
